thread.title: Varun Dhawan sets the ramp on fire as he walks for Kunal Rawal at the Lakme Fashion Week Summer/Resort 2017 – view pics
thread.title_full: Varun Dhawan sets the ramp on fire as he walks for Kunal Rawal at the Lakme Fashion Week Summer/Resort 2017 – view pics

author: Karan Shah
title: Varun Dhawan sets the ramp on fire as he walks for Kunal Rawal at the Lakme Fashion Week Summer/Resort 2017 – view pics
text:
Dabboo Ratnani calendar 2017: Varun Dhawan, Anushka Sharma, Sanjay Dutt – 6 celeb photoshoots that made us YAWN 
We told you that Varun Dhawan was going to set the stage on fire when he walks for Kunal Rawal at the Lakme Fashion Week Summer/Resort 2017 and he did just that. The show started off with a model revving up a luxury sportscar and ended with the actor mesmerising the whole crowd with his walk. Dressed in a white embroidered outfit, Varun looked dapper As ever. As he walked the ramp, people couldn’t take their eyes of him. Sonakshi Sinha, Mohit Marwah, Prateik Babbar and Arjun Kapoor were seen cheering him on as his walk in the parking lot of the venue. 
Talking about Kunal’s collection, he chose light colours like blues, yellows and whites for this summer. We did see his traditional purples and blacks too, but he focused more on the whites this time around. As always his outfits had a lot of prints and embroidery work. We even saw a lot of new shoe designs and accessories during his show. Kunal’s shows always have a theme and this time it was The Race of Separates, which is luxury wear which can be worn on every occasion. He focused a lot on the set design too and this helped enhance the whole show. (ALSO READ: Lakme Fashion Week 2017: Varun Dhawan is all set to dazzle on day 1 ) 
Earlier in the day, we saw the next-gen designers showcase their creations in front of a packed house of designers and dignitaries. This was followed by Varun’s show, after which we will also see Elena Fernandes (of Kapoor & Sons fame) walk the ramp. A video posted by BollywoodLife (@ibollywoodlife) on Feb 1, 2017 at 6:47am PST 
Coming back to Varun, the actor is one of the most followed youth icons. He is stylish too, making him the perfect muse for Kunal Rawal. The actor is currently awaiting the release of his next film – Badrinath Ki Dulhania . Anyway, till then check out all the pictures and videos from Varun’s show right here: 
Also stay tuned to BollywoodLife as we cover the Lakme Fashion Week 2017 LIVE!
